title: What is the difference between a science teacher and a teacher of science? - Quora

response.answer_text: You could argue that they are the same thing. However, if you want to differentiate between the two, a “science teacher” is someone employed by a school (grade school or high school) that teaches science to students in a classroom setting. A “teacher of science” is a broader term and encompasses the former group as well as anyone who teaches science in any setting - formally or informally.
